name: Last L!fe: Attack!
description:
Theodore is a skilled spy and bladesman. His mission is to destroy the superweapon. But he was caught and chased into an alleyway. Now the entire base is in full lockdown.

A top-down/multi-directional game where you must eliminate all soldiers around the base and destroy the superweapon.

Character Controls:

Arrow Keys (Up, Down, Left, Right) - Movement

WASD Keys (W Key, A Key, S Key, D Key) - Movement

Left Click - Sword Attack

Right Click - Gun Attack

P - Restart the Game

Sword Attacks can stop enemy bullets(Small Blue Bullets), but not tank and bounce bullets(Big Blue Bullets & Fast Blue Bullets)

Different Bullets deal different damages

Explosions (Big Gray Circles) deal greater damage than Small Bullets and can damage larger areas.

Sword Attacks deal more damage than Gun Attacks

Buildings can block both bullets (Red Bullets and Blue Bullets), Tank bullets(Big Blue Bullets) and Sword slash(Sword Attack) passes through.

Sniper Bullets (Fast Bouncing Bullets) will bounce off any wall.
